name: Somniphobia (itch)
description:
Tips

Kicking furniture decreases drowsiness more effectively than pinching your arm, however, pinching your arm can give you the last bit of pain you need to make it to furniture. The ghost only appears when your drowsiness is high.

Summary

Your objective is to explore the Walton Manor, collect all 4 pieces of evidence, and avoid contact with the ghost bound to this world. However,  you suffer from  narcolepsy, causing constant drowsiness. The only way for you to stay awake is to inflict pain upon yourself by pinching your arm or stubbing your toe on furniture. But be careful, too much pain will cause you to faint.

Story

A ghost has been haunting the Walton Manor for ages.  You, the exorcist, decide to do what is  long due and end it once and for all.

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Space - Pinch Self / Interact with nearby objects
